RealTimeTraderscom JDS Uniphase Corp JDSU reported first quarter ear nings after the close on Thursday that declined by from the same period last year and fell short of consensus estimates by per share The co mpany also stated that it expects second quarter sales to decline by to JDS Uniphase Corp gapped down Thursday morning but moved steadily hi gher for the majority of the session to close up by at on above average volume The stock has been trading in a range for the last weeks but climbed above resistance to set an week high JDS Uniphase is cur rently trading lower by on K shares As requested your News Alert for TXN follows from Equ ityAlertcom TIs TurboDOXTM Technology Solution Increases DOCSISTM Upstream Capacity New Technology Provides Faster Consumer Broadband Cabl e Internet Surfing DALLAS Nov PRNewswire via COMTEX A new software solution from Texas Instruments Incorporated NYSE TXN TI dram atically increases the network capacity for cable operators and enhances th e consumers cable broadband experience The solution is designed to improv e the performance of TIs data over cable service interface specification DOCSIS software solution TIs TurboDOX solution enables cable operato rs to expand up to three times the number of modems serviced over a single channel while simultaneously improving the user experience by speeding ups tream data flow See sccablemodem The TurboDOX so lution gives cable operators a tremendous opportunity to deliver improved u pstream capacity and application performance while fully benefiting from T Is leading DOCSIS technology said Brett Butler General Manager of T Is Broadband Cable and Wireless Communications TI is well equipped to pr ovide manufacturers the complete design support resources technology and t ools they need to deliver the optimum solution for their systems The ne w TurboDOX software extends TIs DOCSIS solution by including Internet Engineering Task Force IETF working group standards compatibility witho ut requiring any additional infrastructure investments In addition TurboD OX technology uses sophisticated algorithms to improve efficiency and reduc e latency in broadband networks The resulting increase in reversepath cap acity enables cable operators to provide subscribers with data and a full s uite of interactive digital services over Hybrid Fiber Coax HFC networks Cable operators nationwide are fully embracing network upgrades for the technology since Cable Labs recent wave of DOCSIS certification With two TIbased cable modems having achieved the critical CableLabs certificat ion TI recently became the only supplier able to provide manufacturers wit h a complete certified DOCSIS solution including hardware and software DOCSIS technology is critical for maximizing the value of broadban d cable IP networks and TIs TurboDOX works within these existing standard s requiring no proprietary silicon said Michael Harris president of res earch firm Kinetic Strategies Inc TIs solution enables Multiple Service Operators MSOs the ability to develop clearly differentiated delivery pla tforms for the optimal transmission of data and broadband services fully l everaging their investments in DOCSIS About TI Broadband For OEM s developing broadband communications solutions TIs advanced signal proce ssingbased silicon and software platforms deliver the optimal performance lower power consumption and system level integration required to rapidly deploy differentiated next generation products for cable modems digital su bscriber line xDSL modems integrated access devices IADs Voice over I nternet Protocol VoIP gateways carrier infrastructure and home and offi ce wireless networking Texas Instruments Incorporated is the world leade r in digital signal processing and analog technologies the semiconductor e ngines of the Internet age The companys businesses also include sensors a nd controls and educational and productivity solutions TI is headquartere d in Dallas Texas and has manufacturing or sales operations in more than countries Texas Instruments is traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol TXN More information is located on the web site at wwwti com Please refer all reader inquiries to Texas Instruments Incorpora ted Semiconductor Group SC Literature Response Center PO Box Santa Clarita CA ext Trademarks As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from Eq uityAlertcom Yahoo Shopping Expects Day After Thanksgiving Sales to Increase More Than Percent Over Last YearDVideogame Consoles Digital Cameras and Harry Potter Merchandise Are Among the Hottest Selling Items On Yahoo Shopping SUNNYVALE Calif Nov BUSINESS WIRE Yahoo Inc NasdaqYHOO announced that as of noon PST today sales on Yahoo R Shopping were on pace to be more than pe rcent higher than sales levels from the same day last year Preliminary Bla ck Friday results for Yahoo Shopping recently ranked the Webs No port al shopping destination NielsenNetRatings August show a strong s tart to the beginning of the holiday shopping season Despite the soften ing economy Yahoo Shopping has had a very strong year and sales for today far outpace the projected industry estimates for holiday growth said Rob Solomon vice president and general manager of Yahoo Shopping Todays g rowth in sales point to the fact that consumers are becoming increasingly c omfortable with shopping on the Internet and that online shopping continues to be a compelling option for holiday shopping With more than milli on unique visitors a month and millions As requested your News Alert for YHOO follows from Eq uityAlertcom SpotLife Announces Agreement with Yahoo Mail Create S end and View Video Email through Yahoo Mail SAN MATEO Calif Nov BUSINESS WIRE SpotLife the leading provider of integrated person al video solutions and Yahoo Inc NasdaqYHOO a leading global communi cations commerce and media company today announced an agreement to offer users video email services through YahooR Mail The addition of video email services will enable users of Yahoo Mail to easily create and send personalized video email messages to friends famil y and colleagues virtually anywhere in the world SpotLifes technology provides a significant valueadd to the Yahoo Mail service said John Wal sh CEO of SpotLife Video email offers Yahoo the ability to provide the ir users with easy and reliable video email capabilities while ensuring t hat Yahoo Mail maintains a superior service offering and the best Interne t video technology available on the market Under the agreement SpotLif e will provide video email technology and service for Yahoo Mail The ser vice enables Yahoo Mail users to easily record video with a PC video camer a or upload video already existing on their PC SpotLifes technology auto matically compresses and uploads video messages to SpotLifes servers elim inating the need to store large digital videoaudio files on the endusers PC Recipients of a video email receive a notification message containing a link to a Web page on Yahoo Mail where the customer can readily view th e video through the SpotLife Player The videos are composed and sent direc tly from a Yahoo Mail users existing account and managed and stored by Sp otLife Whether consumers are using broadband or dialup connections the v ideo email service works with any Internet connection speed All that is r equired to create and send video email is a PC with the Windows operating system an Internet connection a PC video camera or other video source a nd a Yahoo Mail account Recipients of Yahoo Mail video emails need only a Windows media player to watch video emails sent from Yahoo Mail We believe this new feature will provide Yahoo Mail users with a unique new way to communicate with family friends and business associates said Lisa Pollock director of Messaging Products for Yahoo Our agreement with Sp otLife further supports Yahoo Mails strategy to continue to develop and i ntegrate innovative new features that add real value to peoples lives We are also pleased to provide even more effective marketing services by offe ring rich media ads through this new feature The demand for Internet vi deo technology continues to increase dramatically Based on IDC Forecasts approximately million PC video cameras will be sold by the year Th is represents a significant market for the adoption of video email service s Video email is a great way for friends and family to keep in touch i n an uncertain world said Chris Chute analyst Worldwide Imaging Group IDC The continuing popularity of PC cameras and adoption of new technolog ies will make it easier for this to happen About SpotLife SpotLife is the leading provider of integrated personal video solutions enabling busine sses to easily incorporate personal video into their Internet or wireless s ervice offerings SpotLife has developed a private label video publishing a nd delivery platform that allows organizations to offer endusers the abili ty to easily create publish share and view live or recorded videos any where anytime Through partnerships with Compaq Kensington Logitech Phi lips Electronics and Xirlink SpotLifes Personal Video Broadcasting servic e is currently integrated in out of every PC video cameras sold worldwi de This strong distribution base provides comarketing opportunities for S potLifes infrastructure partners to reach new camera buyers SpotLife also offers a fullfeatured Personal Video Broadcasting site wwwspotlifecom which provides the strongest proven and scalable infrastructure in the Per sonal Video Broadcasting industry Founded in July SpotLife is head quartered in San Mateo California SpotLife is privately owned and funded by Atlas Venture aventic partners the venture arm of UBS CMGI venture s Logitech and Philips Electronics For more information about the company please visit the companys web site at wwwspotlifenet or contact Rick M itchell at NOTE A video relating to this story will be ava ilable for journalists to download beginning today at wwwnewstreamcom and at wwwbusinesswirecom CONTACT for Astrology Fans Around the World SUNNYVALE Calif Nov ENTERTAINMENT WIRE Yahoo Inc NasdaqYHOO a global Internet commu nications commerce and media company today announced it is launching pers onalized forpay services as part of a broad expansion of its offerings on YahooR Astrology The new services are be ing offered through an existing agreement with Centercoms AstroCenter a premier supplier of personalized original astrology content Initially the new services consist of three products an email hotline subscription daily astrology emails and detailed personal astrological reports We re pleased to expand Yahoo Astrologys offerings to provide a broader sele ction of services that people are requesting including personalized premiu m content said Dan Hart senior director games and entertainment busines s Yahoo We are well suited to tap into this lucrative thriving market and we are confident that people will enjoy purchasing this content for th emselves as well as friends and family Yahoo Astrology designed its p ersonalized services to give people easier faster access to indepth astro logical advice Each offering gives consumers the information they want in a familiar easy and direct format People enter their name gender and ti me and place of birth and Yahoo Astrology provides the following A stroHotline People receive direct answers to their astrological q uestions via email for a question This lengthy individual lycreated reply comes from an AstroCenter astrologer who interpre ts the persons astrological chart specifically to answer the quest ion astrological charts ranging in price from to depending on the length of the report Reports include personality compatibility natal and annual predictions amon g others With these new offerings As requested your News Alert for BRCM follows from Eq uityAlertcom Entrepreneur and Investor G Venkatesh Joins Ikanos Comm unications Board of DirectorsDFormer Broadcom Executive Brings Extensive Experience in Semiconductor and Networking Industries FREMONT Calif No v BUSINESS WIRE Ikanos Communications Inc a developer of s mart silicon for profitable broadband today announced that G Ven Venkat esh has joined the companys board of directors Venkatesh brings extensive entrepreneurial and sales experience in the semiconductor and communicatio ns industries to Ikanos The company recently introduced a family of progra mmable chipsets that enable equipment vendors to develop products that deli ver speeds scalable from Kbps to Mbps at a distance of up to f eet over existing copper infrastructure The chipsets support multiple high speed technologies and international standards including Long Range Fast EthernetTM LRFE Ethernet in the First Mile EFM and Very High Bit Ra te Digital Subscriber Line VDSLDMT Venkatesh is an entrepreneur exec utive and investor who serves on the boards of several technology companie s Most recently he was vice president of switching products at Broadcom C orp Venkatesh previously was president and CEO of Maverick Networks which he founded in and which Broadcom acquired in A resident entrepr eneur at Mayfield Fund in Venkatesh was recruited by Mayfield to be p resident and CEO of Silicon Light Machines acquired by Cypress Semiconduct ors in Earlier he spent ten years at Adaptec Inc as general manag er and a senior executive officer I joined Ikanos board because the co mpany has great technology excellent products and really smart people se veral of whom Ive worked with before including Ikanos CEO Rajesh Vashist said Venkatesh Now Ikanos is at a significant junction in its growth a nd I can support the company by helping it to grow to the next phase of cus tomer acquisition Because its chipsets are standards based Ikanos has the potential to dominate the market for broadbandovercopper solutions said Venkatesh The company will thus play an important role in bringing highspeed access to small and mediumsized businesses and homes I expect that the markets Ikanos targets MultiTenantMultiDwelling Units Metro Fiber Extension and Long Range Ethernet will be as big or bigger than the enterprise networking market Ikanos is thrilled to have Ven join t he board He has the kind of experience that Ikanos can benefit from at thi s point in its development said Rajesh Vashist president and CEO of Ikan os Ven is an industry veteran whos launched and scaled up several techno logy startups With his vast experience in management and technology Ven w ill strengthen Ikanos future in the telecom industry About Ikanos Comm unications Founded in and based in Silicon Valley Ikanos Communicati ons Inc has created a new class of silicon that serves the entire range of worldwide broadband markets and applications with a single programmable chipset Ikanos industryleading solution includes the SmartLeapTM for broadband access concentrators and the CleverConnectTM for custom er premise equipment These chipsets form an endtoend broadband solution that enables access equipment vendors to serve many different customers whi le slashing time to market and lowering development manufacturing and inv entory costs Ikanos also offers the Ikanos Programmable Operating SystemT M iPOS that consists of firmware and APIs iPOS enables equipment vendor s to dynamically configure LRFE EFM VDSLDMT VDSLDMT and VDSL DMT Flex on Ikanos chipsets Ikanos Communications provides comprehensive offerings that encompass silicon embedded software reference designs hi ghlevel APIs and extensive documentation Ikanos is a member of and cont ributes to ANSI the IEEE EFM Study Group DSL Forum and ITUT For additional information about Ikanos Communications please visit the compa nys Web site at wwwikanoscom or contact Connie
